GK19gu29___u:208: [64] tad evam eva ramya-keli-sukhenaiva ity anena,
GK19gu29___u:209: bahu-prema-rasena ity anena cātra vraje tat-keli-sukhasya sarva-manorathatvaṃ nānā-prema-rasadatvaṃ ca darśitaṃ syāt /
GK19gu29___u:210: tad evam eva ca pūrvaṃ yad asūyā-rāhityaṃ teṣu māyayā sampāditam,
GK19gu29___u:211: tac ca mahā-viraheṇa vyakta-rahasyāsv apy etāsu nirvyūḍhaṃ syāt /
GK19gu29___u:213: preyasī-prema-prabhāva-vyañjanāya tat-priya-jana-rañjanāya ca khelantī janaka-kanyāyām iva gopa-kanyā-śreṇyāṃ tasya nitya-kāntāsmīti jñānaṃ yadyapy āvṛtavatī,
GK19gu29___u:215: [65] yaḥ khalu premā tādṛśa-tal-līlā-paravaśatayā tasyā iva tasyāḥ para-hasta-patanāvasthāyām api tat-pātivratyaṃ pratipālayitā,
GK19gu29___u:216: sa evāyatyām api tāṃ duḥkha-rūpāṃ śamayitvā melayitā syād eveti māsmānyathā manyathāḥ /

GK19gu29___u:451: ceto viśva-phalāt phalaṃ tvad-aparaṃ kutrāpy ayan muhyati /
GK19gu29___u:452: sad-veṣād api pūtanāpi sakulā tvām eva devāpitā
GK19gu29___u:454: [118] pūrṇimā pūrṇam idam uvāca-tad etat kaimutya-vidhinā prastutya vraja-vāsināṃ tena saṃvāsaṃ satya-loka-parivṛḍhaḥ parama-dṛḍhaṃ cakāreti sarvaṃ śāntam /
GK19gu29___u:455: [119] punaḥ pūrṇimā prāha-kim apy anyad vacanam asti ?
GK19gu29___u:457: tad bhūri-bhāgyam iha janma kim apy aṭavyāṃ
GK19gu29___u:459: yaj jīvitaṃ tu nikhilaṃ bhagavān mukundas
GK19gu29___u:461: [121] pūrṇimā saharṣam āha-pūrva-nirṇayād eva tad idaṃ brahmā sva-puruṣārthatayā varṇayāmāsa /
GK19gu29___u:469: bibhrad goṣṭham apān mahendra-mada-bhit prīyān na indro gavām //
GK19gu29___u:470: [123] atha pūrṇimā varṇayāmāsa-tad evaṃ śrī-bādarāyaṇir api tasya gavendratāṃ nijāśrayatayā śrāvayāmāsa /
GK19gu29___u:472: tathaiva hi tatra śrī-gavendrasyāntaḥ-pratijñā tasmān mac-charaṇaṃ goṣṭham ity ādi /
GK19gu29___u:474: [125] vṛndā tāṃ vandamānā prāha-granthanā pūrṇatayā mayā pūrṇīkṛtāsmīti kiṃvānyad vācyatā yācyatām āsīdatu ?
GK19gu29___u:475: kintu samājñāpayantu tatrabhavatyas tad idaṃ pustakaṃ nāyakam iva hāra-vinyastaṃ karomi iti /
